pr_title: Follow up optimizations to getAllItems() and getItems()

timeline.message:
Use predicate form in getItems(Class)

Signed-off-by: Raihaan Shouhell <raihaan.shouhell@autodesk.com>

timeline.bodyText: Do we need all checks below after adding these predicates?

replies.bodyText: Yes there is a sneaky edge case where type is an ItemGroup.  Now that I think about it I've forgotten to add a test for this and will be adding one. The test does cover this case due to folders
replies.author: res0nance
